description: This file sets up an agent that uses a Google Gemini model and DuckDuckGo tools to process an image and generate a response with information and news.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with models and tools to generate responses.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image with a URL.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A Google model used for generating responses.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A tool for fetching news and information via DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and print a response based on a prompt and images.
